item.title: differentiable-rendering
item.description: Source: https://pytorch3d.org/docs/renderer “Differentiable rendering is a relatively new and exciting research area in computer vision, bridging the gap between 2D and 3D by allowing 2D image pixels to be related back to 3D properties of a scene.”
